text: Kiya woh shaks jo apney rab kay pass ki daleel per ho aur uss kay sath Allah ki taraf gawah ho aur iss say pehlay musa ki kitab (gawah ho) jo paishwa aur rehmat hai (auron kay barabar ho sakta hai?). yehi log hain jo iss per eman rakhtay hain aur tamam firqon mein say jo bhi iss ka munkir ho uss kay aakhri waday ki jagah jahannum hai pus tu iss mein kissi qisam kay shubay mein na reh yaqeenan yeh teray rab ki janib say sirasir bar haq hai lekin aksat log eman laney walay nahi hotay
